meanings.definition: A person who launders money illegally.
meanings.sent1: The police arrested the launderers for their illegal activities.
meanings.sent2: The authorities are cracking down on money launderers in the city.
meanings.sent3: The movie depicted a group of comical launderers trying to hide their cash.
meanings.sent4: The criminal organization used the launderers to clean their dirty money.
meanings.sent5: The undercover agent infiltrated the group of launderers to gather evidence.

meanings.definition: A person who washes clothes or linens for a living.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother used to work as a launderer in a hotel.
meanings.sent2: The launderers at the laundromat always do a great job with my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The launderers in the village were known for their impeccable laundry skills.
meanings.sent4: The hotel hired extra launderers during the busy tourist season.
meanings.sent5: The launderers at the dry cleaners fold clothes neatly and efficiently.
